entities: International Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia
summary:
6. Intends to extend trial judges' terms by 30 June 2011 based on the Tribunal's projected trial schedule, and requests the President to submit an updated schedule by 15 May 2011.

7. Allows ad litem Judges Baird, David, Gwaunza, Harhoff, Lattanzi, Mindua, Picard, Prandler, and Trechsel to serve beyond the cumulative period under article 13 ter, paragraph 2, of the Statute.

8. Urges the International Tribunal to complete its work expeditiously.

9. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
